doc_comment: Database manager for HII-related data structures.

more_decls.pl: _update_package_list: fn (*const HIIDatabaseProtocol, hii.HIIHandle, *const hii.HIIPackageList) callconv(.C) Status
_list_package_lists: fn (*const HIIDatabaseProtocol, u8, ?*const Guid, *usize, [*]hii.HIIHandle) callconv(.C) Status

more_decls.doc_comment: Removes a package list from the HII database.
Update a package list in the HII database.
Determines the handles that are currently active in the database.
Exports the contents of one or all package lists in the HII database into a buffer.
